metadata.Title: CVE-2016-3827 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: codecs/hevcdec/SoftHEVC.cpp in libstagefright in mediaserver in Android6.0.1 before 2016-08-01 mishandles decoder errors, which allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (device hang or reboot) via acrafted media file, aka internal bug 28816956.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
